info.name: Facebook - dark-facebook [old version]
info.description: Deprecated. See style 95359. A dark theme for Facebook.
info.additionalInfo: ==================================================== [ Stay Tuned for a Next Generation of dark-facebook! ] A rewrite of this theme is being worked on. Facebook made a lot of changes that breaks this theme. You can see and try the next version of this theme (a work in progress) at style 95359 and stay tuned for updates! ==================================================== This is my dark theme for Facebook with the main color being dark grey with small shades of blue and red. Has not many gradients or images, just plain colors, but looks easy on the eyes. The color scheme is based on the colors of my Twitter client, thaiWitter (http://tw.dt.in.th/). The CSS userstyle is generated from a Stylus file. You can see the Stylus code, make a contribution, or fork this theme at the GitHub project: ---> https://github.com/dtinth/dark-facebook It is also compatible with Social Fixer, and you can use it either as a Stylish userstyle or a Social Fixer theme. (Update: This theme is now included with Social Fixer) See also: dark theme for Instagram Web Feed - style 82879 Changelog: * 2013-05-13 18:59:06 +0700 9912bbf : make it look better when graph search enabled * 2013-05-13 18:45:58 +0700 16a3e29 : update for graph search and fix transparent hover * 2013-02-09 02:03:22 +0700 0c3a2d6 : Social Fixer: show red frame when hovering the "X" * 2013-02-09 01:57:28 +0700 95479a4 : style the accessibility selected post indicator (when using j, k) * 2013-02-08 14:01:11 +0700 5af9949 : style fixes for app center, messages popout and various optimizations * 2013-02-08 12:31:12 +0700 7249650 : more tweaks for news feed, texts, ads * 2013-02-08 02:51:45 +0700 19edb00 : make better use of inheritance, further reducing file sizes * 2013-02-08 02:08:39 +0700 20970c4 : style refactor, the style is smaller * 2013-02-08 01:26:14 +0700 426f735 : tweak for bottom border of timeline, blinking chat title tweak, seen message tweak * 2013-01-31 23:31:29 +0700 460a47a : tweaks for Social Fixer, support new version of notification box * 2012-12-21 11:27:57 +0700 39ba26c : add to hover popup (facebook seems to change style again). Thanks to @frederickjansen's initial work * 2012-10-26 21:17:26 +0700 8383333 : make image upload dialog look nicer * 2012-10-20 16:43:22 +0700 cdddd53 : better thumbnail style * 2012-10-20 16:05:27 +0700 4276d68 : fixed dialog and overlay transparency problem * 2012-10-20 15:54:37 +0700 921ca07 : keep up with Facebook's CSS changes * 2012-05-07 18:40:27 +0700 d103678 : minor fixes to tab bar * 2012-05-07 18:38:17 +0700 a6101b5 : update for new facebook dialog, better-looking groups tab bar. * 2012-02-24 00:27:50 +0700 192d79a : update for new groups header, change scrollbar colors * 2012-02-08 13:44:40 +0700 21a1c63 : update for new lightbox popup (snowlift) * 2011-12-16 19:46:55 +0700 b232761 : enable the simplified login page only on homepage, as suggested by user 126586. * 2011-12-03 16:47:22 +0700 96a58cb : few stylings to developers.facebook.com. * 2011-12-03 13:13:53 +0700 40e7d0f : fix the stream dropdown icon disappearing due to Facebook changing the sprite image. * 2011-12-03 12:42:27 +0700 d901dff : compress the CSS and images using ImageOptim, to make the userstyle pass the 65535 chars limit on userstyles.org * 2011-12-03 12:11:28 +0700 846d0e7 : update for the new style beeper that appears under the notifications icon * 2011-11-29 19:41:40 +0700 314b9f8 : refactor into opacify * 2011-11-29 19:36:54 +0700 172b654 : fix name highlights when typing text not being shown. * 2011-11-28 20:17:42 +0700 a098613 : increase performance on homepage by roughly 2x. i love stylus, and math. * 2011-11-28 11:08:58 +0700 f07e88c : add background to another version of tooltip found in Facebook * 2011-11-27 23:44:01 +0700 692f8e2 : fix more colors * 2011-11-27 19:29:24 +0700 2d00938 : dim more links on the top bar * 2011-11-27 19:20:41 +0700 f0bde62 : add subtle glow to the notification box * 2011-11-27 19:14:37 +0700 e5d1bc6 : make notifications look red. * 2011-11-25 22:15:31 +0700 088e8f3 : fix when icons can sometimes go out of place * 2011-11-25 22:03:08 +0700 9f32f0e : really fix the search bar. * 2011-11-25 21:59:38 +0700 6df10e5 : new notifications fix, search bar fix * 2011-11-25 18:30:28 +0700 5a10f69 : make the top bar look really awesome * 2011-11-25 16:49:43 +0700 ad01a53 : menu and tooltip color fixes * 2011-11-24 23:04:41 +0700 68e9d50 : timeline tweaks * 2011-11-24 21:01:32 +0700 4057657 : fix image not displaying * 2011-11-24 20:58:07 +0700 40f45c2 : add image for stream button * 2011-11-24 16:54:06 +0700 a1687ca : snowbox - move action buttons below the image. * 2011-11-24 13:46:53 +0700 85139c4 : login page tweak * 2011-11-23 17:42:06 +0700 a2566f8 : also add textarea style * 2011-11-23 17:41:24 +0700 ad20016 : fix input styles in social fixer * 2011-11-23 17:32:28 +0700 0fb5ce4 : social fixer tab colors * 2011-11-23 17:24:20 +0700 b44516d : add social fixer support * 2011-11-23 15:11:14 +0700 a5c22cc : make snowbox image view look nicer * 2011-11-23 12:23:44 +0700 596638d : fix message styles * 2011-11-23 11:32:29 +0700 402e612 : slightly brighter links
